meanings.sent1: She gently bedimpled the clay to create a smiley face.
meanings.sent2: The artist bedimpled the soft clay with her fingers.
meanings.sent3: The children bedimpled the sand to make funny faces.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bedimpled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops bedimpled the surface of the pond.

meanings.definition: (adjective) having dimples in the cheeks or face
meanings.sent1: The baby's bedimpled cheeks were adorable.
meanings.sent2: Her bedimpled smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The bedimpled face of the puppy melted everyone's heart.
meanings.sent4: The bedimpled cheeks added charm to her face.
